doc:
Carleton Hobbs https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carleton_Hobbs 0 Carleton Percy Hobbs, OBE (18 June 1898 – 31 July 1978) was an English actor with many film, radio and television appearances. He portrayed Sherlock Holmes in 80 radio adaptations between 1952 and 1969, and also starred in the radio adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's Sword of Honour. Carleton_Percy_Hobbs , OBE ( 18_June_1898 – 31_July_1978 ) was an_English_actor with many_film_,_radio_and_television_appearances . He portrayed Sherlock_Holmes in 80_radio_adaptations between 1952_and_1969 , and also starred in the_radio_adaptation of Evelyn_Waugh 's_Sword of Honour .
